alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:59PM CDT until May 07 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 959 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of North Platte Airport to near Maxwell to 10 miles southeast of Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Callaway, Brady, Maxwell, Oconto, North Platte Airport, Keith, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Etna, Pressey State Wildlife Management Area, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Lodi and Vroman. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 182 and 208. Highway 83 near mile marker 99. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
